mapper.insert: INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_NTC_FILE_D(NTC_ID, FILE_PATH_NM, FILE_NM, FILE_SYS_NM, DOWN_CNT, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, NTC_TYPE_ID, FILE_ID, FILE_SIZE) VALUES(#{ntc_id},#{file_path_nm},#{file_nm},#{file_sys_nm},0,'N',sysdate,#{cretr_id},sysdate,#{chgr_id},#{ntc_type_id},#{file_id},#{file_size})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.NTC_ID ,A.NTC_NM ,A.NTC_SBST ,TO_CHAR(A.NTC_ST_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTC_ST_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.NTC_ED_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTC_ED_DATE ,(SELECT U.USER_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U WHERE A.CRETR_ID = U.USER_ID ) AS CRETR_ID ,B.FILE_ID ,B.FILE_NM ,B.FILE_SIZE FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_NTC_M A LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_NTC_FILE_D B ON(A.NTC_ID = B.NTC_ID AND A.NTC_TYPE_ID = B.NTC_TYPE_ID) WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN A.NTC_ST_DATE AND A.NTC_ED_DATE AND A.NTC_TYPE_ID='notice' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.CRET_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.NTC_ID ,A.NTC_NM ,A.NTC_SBST ,A.CRET_DT ,TO_CHAR(A.NTC_ST_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTC_ST_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.NTC_ED_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTC_ED_DATE ,A.CRETR_ID ,A.NTC_POPUP_DSPLY FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_NTC_M A WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN A.NTC_ST_DATE AND A.NTC_ED_DATE AND A.NTC_TYPE_ID='notice' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' and A.NTC_POPUP_DSPLY = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CRET_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT COUNT(*) as TOTAL_CNT FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_NTC_M A WHERE NTC_TYPE_ID = #{ntc_type_id} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND (A.NTC_NM LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%' OR A.NTC_SBST LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%')
AND A.NTC_NM LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
AND A.NTC_SBST LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'

SELECT A.NTC_ID ,A.NTC_TYPE_ID ,A.NTC_NM ,A.NTC_SBST ,A.NTC_SBST_TYPE ,TO_CHAR(A.NTC_ST_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTC_ST_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.NTC_ED_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTC_ED_DATE ,(SELECT U.USER_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U WHERE A.CRETR_ID = U.USER_ID ) AS CRETR_ID ,A.CRET_DT ,(SELECT U.USER_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U WHERE A.CHGR_ID = U.USER_ID ) AS CHGR_ID ,A.CHG_DT ,A.READ_CNT ,A.NTC_DSPLY ,A.NTC_POPUP_DSPLY ,NVL(B.FILE_ID,0) AS FILE_ID ,B.FILE_PATH_NM ,B.FILE_NM ,B.FILE_SYS_NM ,B.FILE_SIZE ,B.DOWN_CNT FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_NTC_M A LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_NTC_FILE_D B ON(A.NTC_ID = B.NTC_ID AND A.NTC_TYPE_ID = B.NTC_TYPE_ID) WHERE A.NTC_ID=#{ntc_id} AND A.NTC_TYPE_ID=#{ntc_type_id} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
